metadata.title: CVE-2013-6647 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
A use-after-free in AnimationController::endAnimationUpdate in GoogleChrome.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu1.1352
chromium-browser-l10n - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu1.1352
chromium-chromedriver - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu1.1352
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu1.1352
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu1.1352
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu1.1352').
